name: Kanem
startIntroPart2: Can you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Get out of my way, hurry up!
attacked: Fine, this war shall last for centuries to come!
defeated: Alright, destroy Kanem, because i can always form a new kingdom anyway...
introduction: We have been focred to move to these fertile lands, we are Kanem..!
tradeRequest: Welcome, care for an exchange of things?
